mapper.select: select mem_num as memNum, mem_id as memId, mem_pass as memPass, mem_phone as memPhone, mem_name as memName, mem_nname as memNname, mem_email as memEmail, mem_address as memAddress, mem_account as memAccount, mem_time as memTime from members where mem_id=#{memId} and mem_pass=#{memPass}
mapper.update: update members set mem_name=#{memName}, mem_pass=#{memPass}, mem_nname=#{memNname}, mem_phone=#{memPhone}, mem_email=#{memEmail}, mem_address=#{memAddress} where mem_id=#{memId}
mapper.select: select * from members where mem_name = #{memName} and mem_phone = #{memPhone}
